divs: Sighting Detailsi was in my house when my daughter called out to me saying.. dad come out here hurry! mom wants to show you something.so i went and to my amazement, to the south was 4 balls of light that appeared to only be ten miles away, moving west very slow,then out appeared a 5th one .they seemed to have disapeared into yhin air once they got to a certain point one at a time. and what sucks about this sighting was that we were so amazed we did get a pic or on video , we both even had our cellphones on us!
Summary: lookd like 5 stars cruisn above tree line
trends: There have been no other sightings in dodge
This sighting has never been favorited.
